Items.Title: Build It Plugin Core
Items.Description:
Core module for Build It Plugin

• Screen capture issue with transparent objects fixed
• Updated to the latest Zepeto framework

• Gesture play issue fixed where playing a gesture could cause additional errors
• Vehicle warning removed when no vehicles are present in the scene
• Improved project structure, package cleanup, and tag management
• Added custom scripts:
    • WorldCanvas
    • ZepetoCameraAttacher

Themes.Title: Vehicle
Themes.Name: asset.vehicle
Themes.Description:
Vehicle Theme

We’ve added a complete set of 24 vehicles designed to work seamlessly with the new driving system. They’re ready to drop straight into your project so you can start creating right away!
